Name: José Donatilo
description:
José lives with his family in the community of San Agustín. He is dedicated to agriculture and growing coffee. He obtains his principal income from this.
He also grows arum (a Cuban fruit) of good quality and does the work needed to sell it at an excellent price.

José is very responsible in caring for his crops, providing excellent maintenance. He is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer and manure, and to clear land for cultivating more coffee in order to achieve good production.

José is very pleased with the friendliness and good treatment he has received from Prisma and Kiva. He really appreciates your help.

His dream is to have excellent production.

Trojes, Honduras, March 2021
